titleStmt.title: Reasons for setling [sic] admiralty-jurisdiction, and giving encouragement to merchants, owners, commanders, masters of ships, material-men and mariners humbly offered to the consideration of His Majesty, and the two Houses of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Hedges, Charles, Sir, 1649 or 50-1714.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
